Here's a chart

```{r}
edu %>%
  select(-moe) %>%
  group_by(name) %>%
  mutate(share = estimate / estimate[1]) %>%
  filter(variable == "masters") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = name, y = share)) +
  geom_col(width = 0.8) +
  labs(x = NULL, y = "Share", title = "Share of adults ages 25+ with a master's degree, 2016") +
  theme_din()
```
